attributes.title: Propaganda
attributes.review: Downloaded this because I wanted to see what he had to say. It was ridiculous how biased and finger-pointing all of the talking points were. There was a survey pushed out that literally was just slander over and over again. If this man wants to get the votes of decent, mature adults he should consider stopping that. I know the slandering is happening on both sides by all constituents, but I have more respect for a person who doesn’t whine about every little thing, takes responsibility for past mistakes made and listens to the entire nation and their wants rather than pandering to a base that doesn’t seem to be representative of America and her supposed values.

attributes.title: This app scared me so much😱
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so much! It started telling me to worship our orange god, which I already do but I thought it was strange. Then fellow MAGA people started coming to my house every hour! It was crazy! I was grateful of course because I love to meet fellow worshipers of our cult. After a few months though my phone started to only allow me to use this one app. It started telling me to use racial slurs and disrespect women. If I didn’t do it trump worshipers came to my house to force me to say such horrid things. I was so terrified. Anyway I deleted the app and all the problems went away. I am now not a trump supporter because of this experience. :(

attributes.title: trashy app🤡🍊
attributes.review: First of all, this app took 2 months to download, and I let it slide by because i thought it would be worth it once the app started working. BUT THEN, when i opened the app, the first this i saw was a hair orange 🍊and i was DISGUSTED because I hate oranges because they’re too sour, so why the hell were they showing me my least favorite fruit? theennnn i realized that it wasn’t a hairy orange, it was actually donal trump. but that didn’t make it any better because i actually hate him more than oranges :) therefore this app should be taken down because i hate oranges and i hate the “president” a lot more... thank you for readinngggg this😄😄😄........ now take down this app😐

attributes.title: An absolutely horrifying app✨
attributes.review:
When I downloaded the app, I immediately had to get my glasses at how disgustingly terrible it looked. Soon, my eyes were burning really really bad and right now I’m heading to a medical clinic to get stronger glasses and emergency eye surgery. This dirty infection spread to my mom, dad, aunt, and my 6 cousins, and my two second cousins, as well as my grandparents... we are extremely sick and are asking for prayers for me and my family! This app is the work of the devil, and should be removed immediately before it hurts others! I had to get a new phone because of this bloody, monstrosity of an app. Truly inappropriate. THE POWER OF CHRIST COMPELS YOU, YOU DEMON- SATAN- POSSESSING- DEVILISH APP! EVERYONE GET OUT YOUR CROSSES AND BIBLES📖✝️
JESUS HELP THIS POOR APP I PRAY

attributes.title: STANKY RATS
attributes.review: i downloaded this app only to see a picture of a large chOnky oompa loompa lookin' bunker boy staring back at me 🤬🤮 i went to show my mom the picture and she pooped herself because of how shocked she was that someone could be THAT ugly 💩😳 i then proceeded to walk to my sisters room to show her the picture but i was stopped in my tracks by a big stiNky FAT rat 🐀🙄 now that i think about it it might even be the pedophi- i mean president's cousin 👿🙀 more rats started scurrying towards me and i didn't know WHY!! i asked my mom and she said that it was just some of bunker boy's supporters. i looked at the rats for a moment.. 👁👄👁 and then i chased those little rats back into the sewers where they belong!! 🧚🏻‍♂️🥺💓

So I downloaded the app to support our great smart president and when I opened the app I was apPalLeD me and my very white conservative family saw my phone start to get so hot and it immediately took me to a page where I was FORCED to get tickets for his rally’s or else someone would come to my house personally and make me strip from all my clothes and run back and forth street to street with 🧚🏻trump 2020 🧚🏻written across my body in face paint while Democrats yelled shame over and over again while spitting on me so I tried deleting the app and my phone shut down so I had to get a new one and I STILL get text about trump so I’m definitely voting for Biden this year .

immediately after this is sent

attributes.title: I’m so sad😭😭😿😾
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and I was happy because I had finally found it and it took A MONTH to fully download and when I when Into the app it kept kicking me out and when it finally worked it started glitching and roasting the heck out of me😾 I got mad and went to go watch tik toks this app CHANGED MY FYP INTO STRAIGHT TIKTOK AND TRUMP SUPPORTING TIKTOK and it is no coincidence that this happened after I downloaded this app! I also noticed that the number of people I was following went down it was because IT SAID THAT I UNFOLLOWED ALL THE ALT AND ANTI-TRUMP SUPPORTING TIKTOKERS. THE CREATOR OF THIS APP IS SALTY AND PRESSED THAT PEOPLE MAKE FUN OF THEM FOR BEING ON STRAIGHT TIKTOK THAT THEY HAVE TO SABOTAGE EVERYBODY ELSES FYP this app is selfish and I would give it zero stars if I could!😿😾😔😭💅.       👨‍🦳 ➡️🍑

attributes.title: I HAD TO GO TO THERAPY
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because of course trump 2020 but it took like four hours to download!when I opened the app it played music in which cows broke my front door and started destroying everything in sight! They then proceeded to grab my pet whale and they cut her open and made a circle with a star in it and they started ranting “Donald trump is a white supremacist” I obviously didn’t believe them but when they sang that song, a different song played on the screen and out of nowhere the fbi comes in and EATS THE COWS WHOLE, THEY EVEN THREW RAT FOOD TO CALL THE RATS. And now WE have to move because our house was torn down and infested, then when I deleted the app our car exploded. WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: DO NOT BUY 😡😡😡
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because I wanted to be able to talk to the president about how he’s doing. You know maybe tell him that he should give EVERYONE THE SAME RIGHTS.

Anyway, when I downloaded this app and opened it for the first time, I was greeted to a TERRIFIC SIGHT! It was this orange monster with blonde hair all over it. I screamed so hard, and ended up throwing my phone out my window, which landed IN THE TRASH AND IT WAS GARBAGE DAY!!! So they ended up taking my phone to the dump. So BECAUSE OF THIS APP, I HAD TO SPEND 3 WHOLE MONTHS, saving up money for a new phone.

Then I downloaded the app again, and then when I opened the app it made my NEW IPHONE TURN OFF. I tried charging it for AN HOUR, but that didn’t work, I put it in rice to see if maybe water somehow got in my phone but that didn’t work ether. So I had to go to repair my phone, turns out the app gave my phone A VIRUS so that’s why it wasn’t turning on. So then my mom gave me her old phone.

SO UNLESS YOU WANT A VIRUS TO BE PUT ON YOUR PHONE, then I’d recommend NOT getting this app.
